class.name: gd_OSD_LoadMode
class.brief_description: Binding wrapper for the OSD_LoadMode enumeration from Open CASCADE.
class.description:
This class provides Godot bindings for the OSD_LoadMode enumeration, which is used to specify how shareable libraries are loaded in Open CASCADE.
Note: This is an enum wrapper only; no instances or methods are available except for the enum values.

constant.name: RTLD_LAZY
constant.description: Lazy function call binding; functions are resolved as needed.

constant.name: RTLD_NOW
constant.description: Immediate function call binding; all functions are resolved when the library is loaded.
